name: TestYourself: Psychology
description:
Ever wondered who you really are and what you should be really good at? If you ever wished for a manual to You - this is it! Well, here it comes! TestYourself is a series of interactive psychological tests that combine science and fun and give you real scientific-based analysis of each aspect of your personality and mentality. Developed with the help of psychology experts, TestYourself measures 12 different aspects of You – and provides a professional mental assessment on each block, as well, as a full psychological portrait and recommendations after completing all the blocks. This first pack of tests, TestYourself: Psychology, analyzes two areas of your psychological structure — Nervous System and Intellect. Future add-ons will be released on a monthly system covering all the other aspects, such as Attention, Memory, Creativity, certain social characteristics, etc. So start reading the first chapter of the manual to yourself today – and be sure, it’s a very exciting story!



Purchase or use of this item is subject to the PlayStation®Network Terms of Service and User Agreement. This item has been sublicensed to you by Sony Computer Entertainment America.
